title: Timucuan Ecological & Historic Preserve: Visiting Fort Caroline
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places     Fort Caroline     Visiting Fort Caroline                  Visiting Fort Caroline      Fort Caroline National Memorial hosts the Timucuan Preserve Visitor Center. Choose a link and explore what you can do at Fort Caroline and the Timucuan Preserve: Timucuan Preserve Visitor Center For Kids Booklets and Brochures Living History Pets are allowed in outdoor areas, but must be on a six-foot leash. Please clean up after your pet. There are three additional areas associated with Fort Caroline that you can visit. Ribault Monument Theodore Roosevelt Area Spanish Pond
